product_name: Sunday Afternoons Santa Fe Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The woven, packable Sunday Afternoons Santa Fe Hat gives you excellent UPF 50+ sun protection as you explore the towns and trails of the high desert or just your own neighborhood. Made of 80% toyo-straw paper and 20% polyester. Hat packs flat for travel; however, it's best not to keep hat crushed for long periods of time. UPF 50+ and 4.5 in. wire brim provide excellent sun protection. Braided headband tie lets you adjust the size; interior grosgrain sweatband adds comfort. Can be spot cleaned and line dried; avoid wearing the Sunday Afternoons Santa Fe Hat in wet weather. Closeout.
short_description: The woven, packable Sunday Afternoons Santa Fe Hat gives you excellent UPF 50+ sun protection as you explore the towns and trails of the high desert or just your own neighborhood.
